extendedIngredients.name: lemon jell-o
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 pkg. (3 oz.) JELL-O Lemon Flavor Gelatin

extendedIngredients.name: lime jell-o
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 pkg. (3 oz.) JELL-O Lime Flavor Gelatin

extendedIngredients.name: orange flavor gelatin
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 pkg. (3 oz.) JELL-O Berry Blue Flavor Gelatin

extendedIngredients.name: plain nonfat yogurt
extendedIngredients.originalString: 3 cups plain nonfat Greek-style yogurt, divided

extendedIngredients.name: raspberry flavor gelatin
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 pkg. (3 oz.) JELL-O Raspberry Flavor Gelatin

recipes.title: Rainbow JELL-O Dessert Slices
recipes.instructions: Add 3/4 cup boiling water to raspberry gelatin mix in medium bowl; stir 2 min. until completely dissolved. Refrigerate 15 min. or until cooled. Whisk in 3/4 cup yogurt until blended. Pour into 9x5-inch loaf pan sprayed with cooking spray.  Refrigerate 30 min. or until gelatin is set but not firm.                                             Repeat with remaining gelatin mix flavors to make a total of 4 layers in loaf pan.  Refrigerate 2 hours or until firm.

steps.step: Add 3/4 cup boiling water to raspberry gelatin mix in medium bowl; stir 2 min. until completely dissolved. Refrigerate 15 min. or until cooled.
Whisk in 3/4 cup yogurt until blended.
Pour into 9x5-inch loaf pan sprayed with cooking spray.  Refrigerate 30 min. or until gelatin is set but not firm.
Repeat with remaining gelatin mix flavors to make a total of 4 layers in loaf pan.  Refrigerate 2 hours or until firm.
